mapper.insert: INSERT INTO register (disease_time, symptom_type, see_date, id_no, st_number, name, age, sex, telephone, isstudent, first_further, register_fee) VALUES (${disease_time},${symptom_type},${see_date},${id_no},${st_number},${name},${age},${sex},${telephone},${isstudent},${first_further},${register_fee})
